content: I had never before in my life missed Steven Adams (home in OKC recovering from a concussion) more than I did right there and then. I halfway hoped the arena was all of a sudden gonna fill with the sound of breaking glass and then Adams was gonna come swaggering out of the tunnel on some “Stone Cold” Steve Austin shit, but alas. Nothing. Poor Russell just laid there, beaten, battered, his honor left undefended.
